title: The Anthony Cumia Show 2016-08-08 (Michael Dowd)
description:
TACS is back with Ant giving a recap on his weekend that included a TV recommendation (aka Stranger Things), some tax talk, questions surrounding Hillary Clintonâ€™s health, we get a Scorch update, and see A-Rod getting pissy eyed. 

Mike Dowd joins the show to chat with Anthony about getting into police work, â€œrule breaking,â€ â€œPuerto Rican Mysteries,â€ NYC in the 80â€™s, being dirty, quitting being dirty, and being dirty again. 

Mike also discusses the feds and their involvement, his love/hate relationship with being a cop, money jacking, careless spending, low-key wanting to get caught, wise guys fucking people over, and his current speaking engagements. 

Ant and Mike talk about their jail stints (LOL), Mikeâ€™s plea deal, prison life and life after getting out, family support, growing up on Long Island, cop agendas and myths, prison vs. jail, voting rights for felons, and they wrap up the day discussing a news story about an Olympic leg break
